special_text:
Transcend [i](Activate as a sorcery to gain the next type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
Whenever another creature you control enters, you gain 1 life.
{1}{G}: Student
Target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you have gained this turn.
{3}{B}: Advisor
Freila gains “Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses that much life.”
